      class Main extends Canvas implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • camera
          Camera camera
        • currLevel
          GameState currLevel
        • gameBackground
          BufferedImage gameBackground
        • gameThread
          Thread gameThread
        • handler
          ObjectHandler handler
          Core components for managing game objects, camera view, and map loading.

          handler manages all the game objects, including their creation, updates, and removal. camera handles the view, ensuring the player's position is centered within the game world. mapLoader is responsible for loading and setting up the maps for each level.

        • lifeCount
          int lifeCount
        • mapLoader
          MapLoader mapLoader
        • menu
          Menu menu
        • menuThread
          Thread menuThread
        • state
          GameState state
          The current game state and the current level being played.

          state represents the overall state of the game, such as whether the game is in the menu, active gameplay, game over, or victory. currLevel keeps track of the specific level being played and is used to restore the game state after transitions like game over.
